abstract.text: Present content in a separate view that offers focused interaction.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: To draw attention to an important, narrowly scoped task, you display
a modal presentation, like an alert, popover, sheet, or confirmation
In SwiftUI, you create a modal presentation using a view
modifier that defines how the presentation looks and the condition
under which SwiftUI presents it. SwiftUI detects when the condition
changes and makes the presentation for you. Because you provide a
to the condition that initiates the presentation, SwiftUI
can reset the underlying value when the user dismisses the presentation.

SwiftUI-PageImage-card.png.alt: A black Swift logo on a swirly blue and purple background.

Modality is a design technique that presents content in a separate, dedicated mode that prevents interaction with the parent view and requires an explicit action to dismiss.
